content: this pdf starts with a color front page followed by the full ad-free pattern with color images after that is a printer-friendly pdf with text only ad-free pattern in black ink for those who want to print the pattern without any images x marks the spot on this geometric jacobs ladder crochet square the decorative chains of the jacobs ladder stitch make an x through the center of the square as well as a few other patterns a variation of the jacobs ladder stitch is used in this free crochet pattern rather then crochet long chain spaces that create a ladder look and then looping them together you will crochet chain loops and then chain those together sign up for the newsletter here https //www jessieathome com/jessie-at-home-newsletter/ https //www jessieathome com/jessie-at-home-newsletter/ skill level intermediate crochet pattern sizes one size 12 x 12 languages available english **materials** required yarn caron one pound category #4 aran yardage between 140 and 155 yards meterage between 128 02 and 141 73 meters hooks us 10 0 - 6 mm gauges 12 stitches x 7 row = 4 inches in double_crochet
